channel.title: Posts on Literarily Starved
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Literarily Starved

item.title: Technology: AI & Security - It's Not One Discussion
item.description: The problem with this topic is that it isn’t one single topic. What I see is multiple distinct discussions rolled into a single convoluted mess. So let me deflate this overheated discourse

item.title: Technology: The XZ files
item.description: A Near Miss with Disaster? There are days when you can tell that something has just happened that will leave a lasting mark on your professional world. March 29, 2024, was another one of those days. And this time, the change was not for the better.

item.title: Technology: The (nearly) perfect USB cable tester does exist
item.description: Your USB cables may lie to your PC. Let me show you how to catch those.

item.title: Joke: Updated greek task lists
item.description: When you are tired of your herculean or sysiphus tasks

item.title: History: I didn't know
item.description: When I learned about the holocaust as teenager in Germany, many people from the Nazi era were still alive and lived all around me. Being the curious person I always was, I asked them about what happened and their role in it.
